chatbots.name: How Much Time Respond Ticket?
chatbots.keywords: 034,how much time take to respond ticket?
chatbots.caption:
Our Team Is Provide You Best Global Class Support Experience.

When You Create A Ticket If We Need Anything Else Details From You We Will Response Within a Minutes.

Else If We Work On Your Issue After The Resolution Of Your Issue We Will Response. (Sometimes Few Resolutions Also Take 180-360 Minutes To resolve)

Our Average Issue Resolution Time Is 10 Minutes.
